name: PlantsPedia
description: PlantsPedia was my second project undertaken during the Ironhack Web Development bootcamp, completed alongside my project partner. We initially built out the front-end of the application using React, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap using a mock backend, and subsequently integrated a real backend - as well as user authentication - created with MongoDB, Node, and Express.

name: Elevate Agency
description: This personal project focussed on creating a beautifully designed, single-page application for a marketing agency, inspired by my background in digital marketing. The project allowed me to practice my skills in front- and back-end technologies, including React, Node, Express, MongoDB, and Bootstrap.

name: Book Breakout
description: Book Breakout was the first project I undertook during the Ironhack 24-week intensive Web Development bootcamp. It is a movement game created using HTML canvas, CSS, and Javascript.

name: Padel4All - Work In Progress
description: Inspired by our love of padel, myself and my two project partners collaboratively created Padel4All, a full-stack application designed to make padel social in Barcelona.
